trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it bursts into flames and is reduced to ashes. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the draconian must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

action.name: Serrated Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Shape Theft
entries: After the draconian kills a Medium or smaller Humanoid, the draconian can magically transform itself to look and feel like that creature while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation lasts until the draconian dies or uses an action to end it.
